title: 89/38/EEC: Commission Decision of 22 December 1988 amending Decision 87/544/EEC authorizing Belgium to specify a minimum number of animals in the case of applications for the special premium for beef producers (only the French and Dutch texts are authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 22 December 1988
amending Decision 87/544/EEC authorizing Belgium to specify a minimum number of animals in the case of applications for the special premium for beef producers
(Only the French and Dutch texts are authentic)
(89/38/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The date '31 December 1988' given in Article 1 of Decision 87/544/EEC is replaced by '5 March 1989'.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Belgium.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 December 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 48, 17. 2. 1987, p. 4.
(2) OJ No L 326, 17. 11. 1987, p. 31.
